content: close the round through the front loops of the remaining 6 sts sew to the top of the body covering the first round in the centre final touches add some blush cheeks to your forest spirit just under the eyes for an extra cute look thank you for taking a look at this pattern i hope you enjoyed it be sure to share what you make through one of the social media platforms on the first page i d love to see your creations © bamboomint crochet amy woodhouse all rights reserved no part of this pattern may be published reproduced or sold in any form or by any means shared translated or altered without prior permission in writing from the author you may not sell items made from this pattern © 2022 bamboomint amy woodhouse all rights reserved no part of this pattern may be published reproduced or sold in any form or by any means shared translated or altered without prior permission in writing from the author you may not sell items made from this pattern
